dmca.title: Google DMCA - Dot Com Infoway
dmca.body:
16th October, 2006

From

Dot Com Infoway Ltd.
"GNG House"
K48, Anna Nagar East
Chennal - 600 102
India
Tel: +91-44-42620000 (8 lines)
Fax: +91-44-26284040 (Dedicated)



To

Google, Inc.
Attn. Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
Fax: (650) 963-3255

Dear Sir/Madam,

Sub: Infringement Notification - reg.

We are a reputed ISO certified Software and Web Development Company based in India.

Our Corporate Website: www.dci.in and our SEO website is www.seoservicegroup.com

This communication is to bring to your notice about the copyright infringed by the following website - www.kitinc.com. We have already contacted Google in this regard and we have been notified that Google has removed the pages with copyright issues from Google's listing.

We still find massive sections of our portfolio stolen by the said company and this infringement implies/claims that the work we have done for our clients is done by the said company. Yet, we find these pages listed by Google. We are providing just the sample of the portfolio sections that have been stolen. If we have to list all the pages, the count would go to hundreds Please find the sample of reference URLs that exhibit infringement below in comparison with our website URLs.

The work at Issue	Original content in our website
http://www.kitinc.com/web/asp.htm
http://www.dci.in/portfolio/software_development_ecommerce.asp

http://www.kitinc.com/web/asp_net.htm
http://www.dci.in/web_programming_asp_dot_net.asp

http://www.kitinc.com/web/php.htm
http://www.dci.in/web_programming_php.asp

http://www.kitinc.com/web/cold_fusion.htm
http://www.dci.in/web_programming_cold_fusion.asp

http://www.kitinc.com/web/specialty_services.htm
http://www.dci.in/web_programming_specialty_services.asp

http://www.kitinc.com/seo/doorway.htm
http://www.dci.in/seo_search_engine_friendly_pages.asp

http://www.kitinc.com/seo/link_compaigna.htm
http://www.dci.in/seo_links_campaign.asp

http://www.kitinc.com/seo/seo_process.htm
http://www.seoservicesgroup.com/seoprocess.html

http://www.kitinc.com/seo/seo_complete_package.htm
http://www.seoservicesgroup.com/seocompletepackage.html

http://www.kitinc.com/seo/fag.htm
http://www.seoservicesgroup.com/search_engine_ranking_optimization.html

http://www.kitinc.com/seo/fag.htm
http://www.seoservicesgroup.com/seo_ranking.html

http://www.kitinc.com/seo/fag.htm
http://www.seoservicesgroup.com/seo_company.html

http://www.kitinc.com/seo/links_popularity.htm
http://www.seoservicesgroup.com/linkpopularity.html

http://www.kitinc.com/seo/search_engine.htm
http://www.seoservicesgroup.com/searchengine.html

Please note that the above pages are not the only pages that have been reproduced.

The above infringement affects our business a great deal leading to revenue loss. We will appreciate your immediate attention to resolve this issue and remove the entire website from Google's listing.

For any clarifications please feel free to contact us at +91-44-42620000 or email at civ@dci.in.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Thanking you,

Yours faithfully,
For Dot Corn Infoway Ltd.
C.R.Venkatesh
Chief Executive Officer
